review_body: I ordered using this app for curb side pick up and found out that the store does not even use it. They will not notify you when your order is ready and it also doesn't kick back errors like out of a certain item.
Terrible app. It dies not allow you to register your Family Value card and you cannot see your account number again after app setup. Poorly designed app.
Tried multiple times to create an account & login but was unsuccessful. Uninstalled app. I have a Samsung Note 9.
It looks like the app is only for iFon users, tried multiple times to login but goes to website. Logged in at the website and says that user has been migrated then stuck in a loop.
I love how efficient this location, the staff is always so friendly !! very organized! & most importantly food is AMAZING !!!
I just register and it will not let me log in. I registered the card number and that is fine but I cannot log into the app or website. Please help
Very buggy - can't edit exp date on credit card so had to delete it on desktop site and re add it
Always food and service exceptional
great place to eat, app is nice ,makes ordering easy..
Doesnt log in through facebook like my web site does
So I can't seem to find a way to link/show the Family Rewards? What's the point of having your account on your phone if you can't use your rewards? Am I doing something wrong?
GR8 Food and Service always!!! How do I connect my Stonefire Grill Loyalty Card to the App.?
What happened to map tracking of delivery?
horrible. can't log in
Who cares about the app it is simple and works as designed. Stonefire.. NomNom!!
Confusing instruction
Great Place
EXCELLENT!!!!
Unable to place an order. Disappointed.

Love the app. So many ways to customize your order; I don't have to worry 
they will misunderstand my requests! Sometimes our local restaurant is 
slower, but that happens with all fresh, cooked to order, good restaurants.

The app is ok. I would order more if I didn't have to wait at least 10 
minutes more than it says most of the time and they don't offer any 
discounts or rewards. Staff takes walk-in to go orders before online orders.

App doesn't work. Error message every time information is trying to be 
processed.

Easy app for ordering food, but disappointed the rewards account can't be 
linked.
Great food, Great service, Great value!!!

I like that it has pictures and very detailed. I like to know that i have other options within the options like size. I also like that it describes the portion. I'm always afraid I will order too little.

Generally a good app. I just wish there was a way to write a note if you want to give a specific instruction. For instance I ordered the cauliflower salad but in the options I could only say if I wanted the dressing or not. Could not say put it on the side.
Easy to order and a family favorite, especially the tri tip and lemon garlic. Have not had any issues and have ordered dozens of times and food has been ready on time, every time.

My favourite place to eat! The food is always fresh and amazing, with so many options that makes everyone happy.  The service is lovely and caring.  And I love the concept: good food at fair prices, giving everyone the opportunity to eat well withouth spending a fortune.  THANK YOU, you are truly am...Full ReviewMy favourite place to eat! The food is always fresh and amazing, with so many options that makes everyone happy.  The service is lovely and caring.  And I love the concept: good food at fair prices, giving everyone the opportunity to eat well withouth spending a fortune.  THANK YOU, you are truly amazing.
worthless App said it would over an hour for a pickup. Called the location and it was 20-25 minutes
Awesome place to eat... Fast and delicious...
easy to order from ipad
Best food ever!!!
Easy to use, thanks
It doesn't work
Love this place
